# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G Victores

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

set(KEYWORD "exampleRemoteControlboard")

# Start a project.
project(${KEYWORD})

# Find YARP.  Point the YARP_DIR environment variable at your build.
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)

# Inclue any directories needed for YARP
include_directories(${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Set up our executables.
add_executable(exampleRemoteControlboard exampleRemoteControlboard.cpp)
target_link_libraries(exampleRemoteControlboard ${YARP_LIBRARIES})
